Welcome to my personal webpage!
-----
I am a **postdoctoral researcher** at the [French National Research Institute for Sustainable Development (IRD)](https://en.ird.fr/), member of the [UMI SOURCE](https://www.umi-source.uvsq.fr/) ([University Paris-Saclay](https://www.universite-paris-saclay.fr/en)).

I am an **applied environmental and development economist**. My research focuses on the adaptation to **climate change** and the **exploitation of natural resources** in Sub-Saharan Africa.

I completed my PhD at [Paris-Saclay Applied Economics](https://www6.versailles-grignon.inrae.fr/psae) and the [Climate Economic Chair](https://www.chaireeconomieduclimat.org/en/) in September 2025, under the supervision of [Raja Chakir](https://sites.google.com/site/rajachakir/), [Philippe Delacote](https://sites.google.com/view/philippedelacote/) and [Julien Wolfersberger](https://julienwolfersberger.wordpress.com/).

You can contact me at my [email adress](mailto:edouard.pignede@gmail.com).
